title: Top K Frequent Elements
description: Given an integer array nums and an integer k, return the k most frequent elements. You may return the answer in any order.
hints: Can you use a hash map to count the frequency of each element?
Think about bucket sort - what if you use frequency as the bucket index?
Alternative: Can you use a heap/priority queue to keep track of the top k elements?
real_world_applications: Finding trending topics or hashtags in social media
Identifying most accessed files in a cache eviction policy
Determining top search queries in analytics
Finding most frequent error codes in log analysis
Recommending popular products based on purchase frequency
